subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Bria Hartley scored 17 points, Tiffany Hayes had 16 and No. 4 Connecticut opened its season with a 77-37 rout of Holy Cross. UConn extended its home winning streak to 84 games.
